title: Let's talk about Nocturne.
body:
He's spooky. And he's fun to play.

Uh... help me out here guys.

replies.body:
*Sees no other Rioters in the thread*
#*ALL ALONE...*

lol i remember the 1st time i played vs a nocturne i was in preseason 3 and just learning the game and he ulted and my screen goes dark and stuff and i damn near shit my pants not knowing what was going on... i thought my computer just died lol

Man, when I was first learning how to play the game, I played vs a Mordekaiser... I legitimately thought my game had been hacked when he ulted me and started killing my allies with my ghost. I was freaking out and apologizing to my allies for killing them for like five minutes after that...

> [{quoted}](name=Glory ln Death,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Ae7EaE6L,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-11T03:14:51.541+0000)
>
> Man, when I was first learning how to play the game, I played vs a Mordekaiser... I legitimately thought my game had been hacked when he ulted me and started killing my allies with my ghost. I was freaking out and apologizing to my allies for killing them for like five minutes after that...

My first game vs Zed I was so confused about what he did and whenever he used his ult I would always get away but I had no idea what his Death mark . So I would get away every time and put Nice try or something in all chat and die and I became absolutely sure he was hacking.

I remember when I first played against Tryndamere. I was so frustrated because every time I blew my abilities on him to kill him it seemed like I was always like 2 HP short.

I kept telling my teammates and all they did was laugh at me.

I remember when I first began playing the game in... (When was Braum released, or Jinx, whichever came first).

Anyway, I played Ashe a lot because I figured if I played just the same champion all the time, I would get really good at them.

I played her jungle.

In bot matches.

And this was before Smite was an option as a summoner spell for me (I wasn't the summoner level for it).
That's not that bad. I vaguely remember playing Soraka mid once, but I don't remember how that game turned out.
Once upon a time, this was viable. Ahh, the good old days!
I would always play adcs like Vayne and Caitlyn mid.

I have an only nocturne smurf named "turnedownforwat"

I am very proud of that.

When i first started playing, Nocturne seemed like the edgelord champ that every 12 year old would gravitate towards. Now i love him like a son

**PIERCE THE VEIL**

I remember when I never played bot matches but only customs because that's what my friends did when I first played League (a year before I started playing playing).

The bots always leveled up faster than me and proceeded to beat me to kingdom come (especially in TT).  Then, I finally bought Jinx and wrecked face (this was like, late Season 3). First time I ever had a killing spree or a KDA that was positive in a bots match.  Guess who became a Jinx main for that season.
